game.title: Eternity's Edge
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one mind to another, humanity has discovered a way to essentially achieve immortality. The city of New Eden is the hub of this technology, but with it comes the risk of memory thieves and corruptors who seek to exploit the system for their own gain.
game.beginning: Players take on the role of a gifted memory detective, tasked with solving the murder of a prominent scientist whose research held the key to unlocking the secrets of human consciousness. As they delve deeper into the case, they begin to uncover a sinister conspiracy that threatens the very fabric of society.
game.ending: The game culminates in a final showdown between the player and the mastermind behind the conspiracy, with the fate of New Eden hanging precariously in the balance. Depending on the choices made throughout the game, multiple endings are possible, each with its own unique twist on the world and its inhabitants.
